name: For the Homeland
description:
It is the year 6969, the state of the Bean is at war against the Ugly Bean, the Bean is about to be defeated but thanks to the sacrifice of the sergeant Bean the Bean will be able to win the war. Will you be able to lead your team to victory?

Made in 3 days for Mini Jam 110.

Music credits:

https://www.scottbuckley.com.au/library/legionnaire/
